spec_data.Name: texlive-pst-spirograph
spec_data.Description:
The package simulates the action of a spirograph, which is a
geometric drawing toy that produces mathematical roulette
curves (technically known as hypotrochoids and epitrochoids).
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sun 06 Aug 2017 08:00:51 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Drawing hypotrochoids as with a spirograph
